content.text: By accessing and using the Nativis website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services.
You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only and in a way that does not infringe upon the rights of others or restrict their use of the website.

We strive to provide accurate product descriptions and pricing. However, we reserve the right to correct any errors or inaccuracies and to change or update information at any time without prior notice.
All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. Payment is due at the time of order placement. We accept the following payment methods:
Shipping costs and delivery times may vary depending on the destination. We are not responsible for delays caused by customs or other factors beyond our control.
We offer a 30-day return policy for unopened products. Refunds will be issued to the original form of payment. Shipping costs are non-refundable.
All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Nativis and protected by copyright laws.
Nativis shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of our products or website.
These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/State].
We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.
We collect personal information that you provide to us, such as name, address, email, and payment details when you place an order or create an account.
We use your information to process orders, provide customer service, send promotional emails (if you opt-in), and improve our products and services.
We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business.
We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.
Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites.
Our website is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [your contact email].
